A

ArgHandler - Class in com.satvik.args
This class parses command line arguments, and enables simple retrieval of flags and arguments.
ArgHandlerException - Exception in com.satvik.args
This is the superclass of all Exceptions related to ArgHandler.
Argument - Class in com.satvik.args
This class describes a command line argument.
ArgumentException - Exception in com.satvik.args
This is the superclass of all Exceptions related to the parsing of arguments in ArgHandler.
ArgHandler(String[]) - Constructor for class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
This is the only constructor of ArgHandler.
ArgHandlerException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.ArgHandlerException
Constructor of ArgHandlerException.
Argument(String) - Constructor for class com.satvik.args.Argument
Constructor for Argument, where it's raw value can be assigned
ArgumentException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.ArgumentException
Constructor of ArgumentException.
argCount() - Method in class com.satvik.args.ArgHandler
Returns the number of arguments currently in the queue.

C

com.satvik.args - package com.satvik.args
This package contains ArgHandler, and all of the classes required by it.
com.satvik.struct - package com.satvik.struct
This package contains classes which describe commonly used data structures .
CannotParseValueOfFlagException - Exception in com.satvik.args
A CannotParseValueOfFlagException describes the nature of an error on parsing values of flags in ArgHandler.
CannotParseValueOfFlagException(Flag<?>) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.CannotParseValueOfFlagException
Constructor of CannotParseValueOfFlagException, to be used when a Flag cannot carry a value.
CannotParseValueOfFlagException(Flag<?>, String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.CannotParseValueOfFlagException
Constructor of CannotParseValueOfFlagException, to be used when a Flag has been given a value of the wrong type.
canHaveValue(boolean) - Method in class com.satvik.args.Flag
This method sets whether the Flag can be assigned a value or not.

E

EmptyListException - Exception in com.satvik.struct
This class describes an Exception where items are attempted to be popped/removed from an empty list.
EmptyListException() - Constructor for exception com.satvik.struct.EmptyListException
Constructor of EmptyListException.
extractValue(String) - Static method in class com.satvik.args.Flag
This method extracts the value after a "=" present in a String, and returns it.

F

Flag<T> - Class in com.satvik.args
This is the class describing a type of Flag which must be assigned a value.
FlagException - Exception in com.satvik.args
This is the superclass of all Exceptions related to the parsing of flags in ArgHandler.
Flag(String, String) - Constructor for class com.satvik.args.Flag
This is the constructor of Flag which accepts the short and long forms of the Flag.
FlagException(String) - Constructor for exception com.satvik.args.FlagException

This method returns the Flag whose short form contains the charcter passed to it.

This method returns the Flag whose short or long form matches the String passed to it.

This method returns the item (type <T>) at the index passed to it.
getListItemAt(int) - Method in class com.satvik.struct.LinkedList
This method returns the ListItem<T> at the index passed to it.
getSize() - Method in class com.satvik.struct.LinkedList
This method recalculates and returns the size of the LinkedList, ie, the number of items in it.
getState() - Method in class com.satvik.args.Flag
This method returns the current state of the Flag.
getValue() - Method in class com.satvik.args.Argument
This method returns the raw value of the Argument.
getValue() - Method in class com.satvik.args.Flag
This method returns the value of the Flag, if set previously.
getValue(Parser<T>) - Method in class com.satvik.args.Argument
This method returns the value of the Argument, parsed using the Parser passed to it.
getValue(Class<T>) - Method in class com.satvik.args.Argument
This method returns the value of the Argument, parsed into an Object of Class 'clazz'.

L

LinkedList<T> - Class in com.satvik.struct
This class describes a list comprised of ListItems linked together.
ListException - Exception in com.satvik.struct

ListIndexOutOfBoundsException - Exception in com.satvik.struct

matches(char) - Method in class com.satvik.args.Flag
This method returns whether the character passed to it is a representation of this Flag, ie, it is the second characterof the short form.
matches(String) - Method in class com.satvik.args.Flag
This method returns whether the String passed to it is a representation of this Flag, ie, it is either one of the long or short forms.

Returns the first argument in the queue, then pops it out.

Parser<T> - Interface in com.satvik.args
This interface provides methods for parsing objects into one another.

This method must be overriden in the implementing class, or can be used via lambda expressions.

This method accepts a String to parse and the class of the target type.

This method returns the item at the index passed to it, simultaneously removing it.
push(T) - Method in class com.satvik.struct.Queue
This method pushes an item to the beginning of the queue.
push(T) - Method in class com.satvik.struct.Stack
This method pushes an item to the end of the stack.
pushItemAt(T, int) - Method in class com.satvik.struct.LinkedList
